Storyline:
Even in a world populated entirely by mechanical beings Rodney Copperbottom is considered a genius inventor.
Rodney dreams of two things, making the world a better place and meeting his idol, the master inventor Bigweld.
On his journey he encounters Cappy, a beautiful executive 'bot with whom Rodney is instantly smitten,
the nefarious corporate tyrant Ratchet who locks horns with Rodney, and a group of misfit 'bots known as the Rusties, led by Fender and Piper Pinwheeler.
